doc.title: CitPoint Asia: Is The China A-share Bubble About To Burst? Or Is It Bursting Already? 花旗亚洲观点：A 股泡沫即将破裂？还是已经在破裂中？
doc.source_uri: 25.9月 普通个人版/9.1 普通个人版/Citi/Asia Trading Strategies  亚洲交易策略_2025-08-28

passages.text: Markets 市 Mohammed Aug 28, 2025 10:43AM CST 25 年 8 月 28 日上午 10:43（美国中部标准时间） 场 Apabhai
NOT A PRODUCT OF CITI RESEARCH - INTENDED FOR INSTITUTIONAL CLIENTS ONLY. 非花旗研究产品 - 仅供机构客户使用。
宏观：A股泡沫即将破裂？还是已经在破裂中？

The Chinese A- share market suffered its largest fall of the month yesterday - while some may attribute this to profit taking there are larger grounds for concern. 中国A股市场昨日遭遇本月最大跌幅——尽管有人可能将其归因于获利回吐，但更大的担忧仍然存在。
Chart 1: Yet Another Rally Driven By Stimulus Hopes About To Be Disappointed? 图表1：又一次由刺激预期推动的反弹即将令人失望？
Source:Citi Trading Strategies 来源：花旗交易策略

1. The rally has been significantly driven by an increase in margin loans and fast money inflows. This seems to be making brokers and the Government nervous and steps are being taken to curb the flow of funds into the margin loans.
1. 此轮上涨主要受到保证金贷款增加和短期资金快速流入的显著推动。这似乎让券商和政府感到不安，正在采取措施限制资金流入保证金贷款。
Chart 2: China Rally Vulnerable To Unwinding Of Retail Margin Loans 图表2：中国反弹易受散户融资融券平台影响
Source:Citi Trading Strategies 来源：花旗交易策略
(Click image to enlarge) （点击图片放大）

Chinese margin loans are now at their highest level since 2015 and the Government has long memories of the impact of the \(60\% +\) drop in margin loans caused by their attempts to regulate an overheated, debt- fueled market. At that time margin loans were at very similar levels to where they are today and the unwind of that bubble led to a near \(50\%\) decline.. There have been increasing inflows not only from domestic retail investors but from a rotation from bonds into equities as well as a surge of inflows from foreign investors who are selling the rest of Asia ex- Japan to buy China.

中国的融资融券余额现已达到自2015年以来的最高水平，政府对当年因试图监管过热、债务驱动的市场而导致融资融券余额暴跌逾 \(60\%\) 的影响记忆犹新。当时的融资融券余额与如今的水平非常接近，而那次泡沫的破裂导致市场下跌近 \(50\%\) 。近期不仅有来自国内散户投资者的资金流入，还出现了从债券转向股票的资金轮动，以及外国投资者的大量资金流入，他们正在抛售除日本外的亚洲市场资产以买入中国资产。
Chart 3: Playbook Has Been Seen Before - China Moved To Curb Margin Loans In 2015 When They Reached The Same Magnitude
图表3：剧本曾经上演——2015年中国在融资融券余额达到同等规模时采取了抑制措施
Source:Citi Trading Strategies

2. The macro economy is getting worse not better - the rally is predicated upon more stimulus being provided by the Chinese Government but our numbers are suggesting that a rise in the equity market and bond yields gives more comfort to Chinese policymakers that their policies are "working" and hence reduces the need for further action. We have suggested before that China policy action will be forthcoming when the MCS of Vanke reaches 80% currently it is below 60%. We have remained skeptical that the Chinese stimulus "bazooka" is about to appear any time soon.
2. 宏观经济正在恶化而非好转——本轮反弹是基于中国政府将提供更多刺激的预期，但我们的数据表明，股市和债券收益率的上升让中国决策者更有信心认为其政策正在“奏效”，从而降低了进一步采取行动的必要性。我们此前曾建议，当万科的 MCS 达到 80% 时，中国的政策行动才会出现——目前这一数值仍低于 60%。我们一直对中国的刺激“重炮”会在短期内出现持怀疑态度。
Chart 4: MCS Of China Vanke Not Suggesting Any Imminent Policy Action图表4：中国万科的 MCS 未显示任何迫近的政策行动迹象
Source: Citi Trading Strategies
(Click image to enlarge)

3. As usual earnings are disappointing in China - over half way through earnings season, the CSI300 has delivered earnings growth of just 0.2%. More importantly (and unlike US companies) earnings are disappointing by 12.1%. There are few signs yet that the "anti-involution" measures being taken by the Chinese Government are working - earnings from the food delivery and EV sectors are showing the fierce price competition which is cannibalizing market share and structurally eroding margins.
3. 和往常一样，中国的盈利表现令人失望——财报季已过半，沪深 300 指数的盈利增长仅为 0.2%。更重要的是（与美国公司不同），盈利低于预期达 12.1%。目前几乎没有迹象表明中国政府正在采取的“反内卷”措施已见成效——外卖和电动车行业的盈利显示出激烈的价格竞争，这正在蚕食市场份额并从结构上侵蚀利润率。

4. We remain worried about the disinflationary forces in China. From our prism of inflation being an FX phenomenon rather than even a monetary phenomenon we see China continuing to suffer from disinflation.
4. 我们仍然担心中国的通缩力量。从我们将通胀视为一种外汇现象而非货币现象的角度来看，我们认为中国将继续受到通缩的影响。
图表5：中国预计将进一步陷入通缩，利润压力加大
Source: Citi Trading Strategies
(Click image to enlarge)

Our numbers are suggesting that Chinese disinflation is likely to get worse with an overcapacity of goods meant for exports likely to suppress prices domestically. A disinflating economy rarely delivers earnings growth. To avert this China would need to devalue the currency but the USDCNY is at its lowest since last November.
我们的数据显示，中国的通缩情况可能会进一步恶化，出口商品的产能过剩可能会压低国内价格。通缩的经济体很少能带来盈利增长。为了避免这种情况，中国需要贬值货币，但美元兑人民币汇率已处于去年11月以来的最低水平。

5. There is significant complacency in the market from foreign investors as well. Foreign investors have sold \(27.9bn of equities in Asia ex-Japan ex-China and bought roughly the same amount in the China A-share market. In particular the gap between Indian equities, which have seen\) 13bn of outflows this year, and China A-shares is particularly marked. If foreign investors are turning more bearish on Indian equities, China is not the place that will deliver them the growth they want. We continue to see sub-trend growth while the current policies continue and we see no signs yet that the Government will do anything apart from incremental changes rather than the dramatic ones the market is hoping for.

5. 外国投资者在市场中同样表现出显著的自满情绪。外国投资者在除日本和中国以外的亚洲市场抛售了279亿美元的股票，并在中国A股市场买入了大致相同金额的股票。尤其是印度股市与中国A股之间的差距尤为明显——今年印度股市已出现130亿美元的资金流出。如果外国投资者对印度股市的看法转向更加悲观，中国并不是能够为他们带来所期望增长的地方。在当前政策持续的情况下，我们预计增长将继续低于趋势水平，并且尚未看到政府会采取市场所期望的重大举措，而只是进行一些渐进式的调整。
Chart 6: Foreign Investors Have Fled India And Bought China On Stimulus Hopes图表6：外国投资者撤离印度，基于刺激预期买入中国
Source:CitiTradingStrategies 来源：花旗交易策略

Our measure of China risk, CGCHRISK, is the probability that the US applies sanctions to China in the same way it has done to Russia. This has now fallen to a record low - from our understanding of the indicator this has little to do with China but more to do with positions being stopped out. This indicator is, in our view, giving a false sense of comfort. We have highlighted its role previously in the valuations that foreign investors give to the A- share market. For foreign investors, A- shares are like a CDS and at the moment the probability of "default" being priced in is too low.
我们对中国风险的衡量指标CGCHRISK，是指美国以对待俄罗斯的方式对中国实施制裁的概率。该指标现已降至历史最低水平——根据我们对该指标的理解，这与中国本身关系不大，而更多是由于仓位被止损所致。在我们看来，这一指标带来了虚假的安全感。我们此前已强调过它在外国投资者对A股市场估值中的作用。对于外国投资者而言，A股就像是一种信用违约掉期（CDS），而目前市场所计入的“违约”概率过低。
Chart7:CGCHRISKIndicatorOfMarketConcernHasFallenToRecordLows 图表7：CGCHRISK市场担忧指标已降至历史最低水平
Source:CitiTradingStrategies 来源：花旗交易策略
(Click image to enlarge) （点击图片放大）

6. Citi's Fear and Greed index for Hong Kong has triggered. We expect the Hong Kong equity market to come under pressure. Positioning in the China A-share market is similarly vulnerable and an unwind of this move, especially if it involved state funds taking profits on stakes they took earlier in the year when they supported the market could be relatively swift. It would not be a surprise to see the CSI300 trade below 3800 again.
6. 花旗香港恐惧与贪婪指数已触发。我们预计香港股市将面临压力。中国A股市场的仓位同样脆弱，此轮行情的回吐可能会相对迅速，尤其是在涉及国家队基金对年初入市护盘时所持股份进行获利了结的情况下。如果看到沪深300指数再次跌破3800点，也不足为奇。
Chart 8: Positioning Is Vulnerable In The A-Share Market 图表8：A股市场的仓位较为脆弱
Source:Citi Trading Strategies 来源：花旗交易策略
(Click image to enlarge)

From a valuation perspective the market is again one standard deviation above the mean of the forward P/E ratio, a place from where the market corrected in 2021. Valuation levels above here have only been driven by bubble periods which have inevitably burst. 从估值角度来看，市场再次处于远期市盈率均值之上一个标准差的位置，这正是市场在2021年出现回调的位置。高于此处的估值水平仅出现在泡沫时期，而这些泡沫最终都不可避免地破裂。
Chart 9: Market Valuations At Their Highest Levels Since Late 2021 - Threatens Bubble
Source:Citi Trading Strategies 来源：花旗交易策略

The expansion of a bubble is about hopes and projections that are unrealistic and unreachable - in this case they are built on the hope that the Chinese Government is about to launch a bazooka stimulus which we think unlikely. The unwind of the bubble is all about positioning and inflicting maximal pain on all those who dared to believe.
泡沫的膨胀源于不切实际、无法实现的希望和预期——在这种情况下，这些希望建立在中国政府即将推出“火箭筒”式刺激政策的设想之上，而我们认为这种可能性不大。泡沫的破裂则完全关乎市场仓位调整，并对所有敢于相信的人造成最大程度的打击。
Chart 10: Chinese Earnings Growth Remains Absent - Expectations Being Disappointed Once Again 图表10：中国企业盈利增长依然缺席——预期再次落空
Source:Citi Trading Strategies 来源：花旗交易策略
